exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type m, n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n Unable to unify "A" with "mk_Tn m (fun i : nat => mk_Tn n (coeff_mat x0 A i))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
n: nat
m: nat
x0: T
A: matrix m n

Goal:
mk_matrix m n (coeff_mat x0 A) = A

Premises:
mk_matrix : forall m n : nat, (nat -> nat -> T) -> matrix m n
coeff_mat = fun (m n : nat) (x0 : T) (A : matrix m n) (i j : nat) => coeff_Tn x0 (coeff_Tn (mk_Tn n (fun _ : nat => x0)) A i) j : forall m n : nat, T -> matrix m n -> nat -> nat -> T Arguments m, n are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope _ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
matrix = fun m n : nat => Tn m (Tn n T) : nat -> nat -> Type Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> VectorDef.t ?C n0 where ?A : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type] ?B : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type] ?C : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : Fin.t n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type] ?B : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type] ?C : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type]
coeff_Tn_bij : forall (x1 : ?T) (u : nat -> ?T) (i : nat), (i < ?n)%nat -> coeff_Tn x1 (mk_Tn ?n u) i = u i where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type] ?n : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- nat]
plus_zero_r : forall x : ?G, plus x zero = x where ?G : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- AbelianGroup]
sum_n_n : forall (a : nat -> ?G) (n0 : nat), sum_n_m a n0 n0 = a n0 where ?G : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- AbelianGroup]
mk_Tn : forall n0 : nat, (nat -> ?T) -> Tn n0 ?T where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type]
VectorDef.nth = fun A : Type => fix nth_fix (m : nat) (v' : VectorDef.t A m) (p : Fin.t m) {struct v'} : A := match p in (Fin.t m') return (VectorDef.t A m' -> A) with | @Fin.F1 n => VectorDef.caseS (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => A) (fun (h : A) (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A n0) => h) | @Fin.FS n p' => fun v : VectorDef.t A (S n) => VectorDef.caseS (fun (n0 : nat) (_ : VectorDef.t A (S n0)) => Fin.t n0 -> A) (fun (_ : A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n0) (p0 : Fin.t n0) => nth_fix n0 t p0) v p' end v' : forall (A : Type) (m : nat), VectorDef.t A m -> Fin.t m -> A...
iter_nat_point : forall (op : ?T -> ?T -> ?T) (x1 : ?T), (forall x : ?T, op x x1 = x) -> forall (a : nat -> ?T) (n0 : nat), iter_nat op x1 a n0 n0 = a n0 where ?T : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type]
nat_rect_plus : forall (n m : nat) (A : Type) (f : A -> A) (x : A), nat_rect (fun _ : nat => A) x (fun _ : nat => f) (n + m) = nat_rect (fun _ : nat => A) (nat_rect (fun _ : nat => A) x (fun _ : nat => f) m) (fun _ : nat => f) n
VectorDef.t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> Prop), P 0%nat (VectorDef.nil A) -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t -> P (S n) (VectorDef.cons A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t A n), P n t
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n0 -> VectorDef.t ?B n0 -> Type, P 0%nat (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n0 v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n0 v2)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n0) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type] ?B : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n0), P n0 (VectorDef.cons ?A h n0 t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [T : Type m : nat n : nat x0 : T A : matrix m n |- Type]
List.existsb_nth : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d : A), (n < length l)%nat -> List.existsb f l = false -> f (List.nth n l d) = false
seq.nth_ncons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (m : nat) (x : T) (s : list T) (n : nat), seq.nth x0 (seq.ncons m x s) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) m then x else seq.nth x0 s (ssrnat.subn n m))
seq.nth_nil : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat), seq.nth x0 Datatypes.nil n = x0
SuccNat2Pos.inj : forall n m : nat, Pos.of_succ_nat n = Pos.of_succ_nat m -> n = m
Nat.min_dec : forall n m : nat, {Nat.min n m = n} + {Nat.min n m = m}
Nat.min_spec : forall n m : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ Nat.min n m = n \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ Nat.min n m = m
Nat.min_spec_le : forall n m : nat, (n <= m)%nat /\ Nat.min n m = n \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ Nat.min n m = m
List.nth_indep : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (d d' : A), (n < length l)%nat -> List.nth n l d = List.nth n l d'
Nat.divide_gcd_iff' : forall n m : nat, Nat.divide n m < -> Nat.gcd n m = n
Nat.strong_right_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, (z <= n)%nat -> (forall m : nat, (z <= m)%nat -> (m < n)%nat -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (z <= n)%nat -> A n
Nat.mul_id_l : forall n m : nat, m <> 0%nat -> (n * m)%nat = m < -> n = 1%nat
Nat.min_unicity : forall n m p : nat, (n < m)%nat /\ p = n \/ (m <= n)%nat /\ p = m -> p = Nat.min n m
Nat.compare_eq_iff : forall n m : nat, (n ?= m) = Eq < -> n = m
Nat.eqb_eq : forall n m : nat, (n =? m) = true < -> n = m
Nat.mul_eq_1 : forall n m : nat, (n * m)%nat = 1%nat < -> n = 1%nat /\ m = 1%nat
Nat.eq_mul_1 : forall n m : nat, (n * m)%nat = 1%nat < -> n = 1%nat /\ m = 1%nat
Nat.mul_id_r : forall n m : nat, n <> 0%nat -> (n * m)%nat = n < -> m = 1%nat
Nat.mul_eq_0 : forall n m : nat, (n * m)%nat = 0%nat < -> n = 0%nat \/ m = 0%nat
Nat.eq_mul_0 : forall n m : nat, (n * m)%nat = 0%nat < -> n = 0%nat \/ m = 0%nat
Nat.divide_gcd_iff : forall n m : nat, (0 <= n)%nat -> Nat.divide n m < -> Nat.gcd n m = n

ssrnat.subnK : forall m n : nat, is_true (ssrnat.leq m n) -> ssrnat.addn (ssrnat.subn n m) m = n
Nat.min_r : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Nat.min n m = m
ssrnat.minn_idPr = fun m n : nat => (fun _evar_0_ : Bool.reflect (ssrnat.minn n m = n) (ssrnat.leq n m) => eq_rec_r (fun _pattern_value_ : nat => Bool.reflect (_pattern_value_ = n) (ssrnat.leq n m)) _evar_0_ (ssrnat.minnC m n)) ssrnat.minn_idPl : forall m n : nat, Bool.reflect (ssrnat.minn m n = n) (ssrnat.leq n m) Arguments m, n are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
Nat.min_l : forall n m : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> Nat.min n m = n
max_l : forall n m : nat, (m <= n)%nat -> Init.Nat.max n m = n
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n)
Nat.eq_mul_0_l : forall n m : nat, (n * m)%nat = 0%nat -> m <> 0%nat -> n = 0%nat
